subject: Cycling, Road
Olympic Games (2012)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Britain’s Mark Cavendish was seen as a favorite in the Olympic men’s road race, but he faded to 28th. Alexandr Vinokurov of Kazakhstan won the gold.
snippet: Britain’s Mark Cavendish was seen as a favorite in the Olympic men’s road race, but he faded to 28th. Alexandr Vinokurov of Kazakhstan won the gold.
